spec.name: Rick's Café
spec.description: Rick's Café is a world-famous restaurant and bar in Casablanca, meticulously designed as a faithful recreation of the fictional bar in the classic 1942 film **Casablanca**. Located near the Old Medina, it offers a sophisticated fine-dining experience with an **International menu** and a nostalgic ambiance. It functions as a powerful tribute to cinematic history, attracting tourists and film enthusiasts globally, though the original bar in the movie was entirely fictional.
